name: Cross Orb
description:
This is my entry for the Mix and Game Jam 2020.

It's a Rolling Ball x Open-Ended Exploration game, 

In this game you can move an orb around, and you can collect yellow Embers that charge up the orb's boost. Boosting will consume the Embers you picked up. You can use the boost to access to new areas.

Playable with gamepad or keyboard, although currently the keyboard won't deliver the full gameplay experience. I also haven't yet been able to adjust the spacebar controls and the boost is pretty much unuseable with a keyboard.

Left Stick / WASD : Move the orb

Any Triggers / Space bar : Boost

Start / Escape : Quit Game

All assets, including the music and the sounds were done by me in 48 hours, except for the curvy ramp texture, which is an Unreal Engine starter material.
